productIdType.x-fqm-value-getter: (SELECT array_agg(identifier_type.jsonb ->> 'name') FROM jsonb_array_elements(:src__acquisition__orders_storage__titles.jsonb->'productIds') AS elems LEFT JOIN ${tenant_id}_mod_fqm_manager.src_inventory_identifier_type identifier_type ON (elems.value->>'productIdType')::uuid = identifier_type.id)
productIdType.x-fqm-filter-value-getter: (SELECT array_agg(lower(identifier_type.jsonb ->> 'name')) FROM jsonb_array_elements(:src__acquisition__orders_storage__titles.jsonb->'productIds') AS elems LEFT JOIN ${tenant_id}_mod_fqm_manager.src_inventory_identifier_type identifier_type ON (elems.value->>'productIdType')::uuid = identifier_type.id)

qualifier.description: Information about the binding, format, volume numbers, part of a set, publisher, distributor, etc. which might be enclosed in parenthesis
